subs.text: Idea for people working on new identity services. Let's come up with a common API for them, so you can plug new services into apps that use identity. Sort of like jQuery but for identity. (Reminder: jQuery was created because browsers had incompatible APIs. jQuery flattened them all out. A very valuable piece of tech.)

TFW the host of a news show likens his panel to people talking about a hurricane on TV days before it makes landfall. The worst part was he was knew it made him look like an idiot. (I switched to Bojack Horseman reruns. At least there I might have forgotten the plot.)
One of the best things about having a blog is that I can put this here and no one gets to complain. :boom:
